title: League of Legends doesn't launch
body:
League of Legends can't launch for some reason when i use the simple launcher it says "failed to launch RADS\system=rads_user_kernel.exe" which means that i have to download a new one and replace it but i've tried doing it and it didn't do anything. Launching it trough admin or lol.launcher.admin doesn't work either since nothing even happens.
I've tried reinstalling the game, which has left me with the same problems but without most of the game files..

replies.body: The kernel error you're seeing can happen if your security settings are blocking game files from being accessed.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception and get it to launch.  Let me know if you have any questions!
